definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
monkey (dialect)/little monkey (affectionate term for children, subordinates)

sentences.english: This is two types of the monkey bridge.
sentences.chinese: 這是兩種不同類型的馬騮橋。

sentences.english: Taxi Drivers Monkey Keung and Fatty Ming delight in discussing gossips of the city.
sentences.chinese: 的士司機馬騮強及肥明終日以談論城中是非爲樂。

definition: operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
limited (of talent or ability)/(archaic) solid wheel (without spokes)
variant of 御[yu4]/to drive/to manage/to control
to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to waver
to annoy/to irritate/to be annoyed/to sulk
